desc: Buy home permanent hair dye for vibrant punk gothic hair colour, highlighted hair, blonde hair bleach, grey hair and hair colour tutorials. Order Before 3:00pm For Next Day Delivery* | Free Delivery On All Orders Over £25. www.smartbeautyshop.com Not Tested on Animals, Most Products are Suitable for Vegans, & PPD Free.

layout.text:
WITH ANTI-BREAKAGE FORMULATION
Ever wanted to go blonde, but were concerned about brittle dry straw like hair?
Look no further, Smart Beauty brings you a high-lift blonde, with Smart Plex Anti- Breakage blended into the formulation.
This not just an over night wonder conditioner, it restores, protects and rebuildsthe physical hair structure during and after colouring.
